mapper.sql: id, order_no, user_id, maid_user_id, maid_money, maid_percent, order_actual_money, merchant_id, product_id, product_name, level, level_name, create_time, available
mapper.insert:
insert into ss_maid_info
order_no,
user_id,
maid_user_id,
maid_money,
maid_percent,
order_actual_money,
merchant_id,
product_id,
product_name,
`level`,
level_name,
create_time,
available,
#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{maidUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{maidMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{maidPercent,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{orderActualMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{merchantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{level,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
#{levelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{available,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update ss_maid_info
order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
maid_user_id = #{maidUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
maid_money = #{maidMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER},
maid_percent = #{maidPercent,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_actual_money = #{orderActualMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER},
merchant_id = #{merchantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
level = #{level,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
level_name = #{levelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
available = #{available,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT usr.logo_url as logoUrl, usr.real_name as realName, usr.register_mobile as phone, smi.level as level, smi.maid_money/100 as maidMoney, smi.create_time as createTime FROM ss_maid_info smi,ss_user usr WHERE usr.available=1 AND smi.available=1 AND smi.maid_user_id=usr.user_id and smi.user_id=#{userId}

SELECT usr.real_name as realName, so.actual_money as money/100, so.payment_time as buyTime, so.actual_money*sp.maid_percent/100 as maidMoney, usr.register_mobile as mobile FROM ss_user usr, ss_order so, ss_product sp WHERE usr.available = 1 AND usr.referrer = #{userId} AND so.available = 1 AND usr.user_id = so.user_id and usr.member_level=sp.`level`
SELECT count(*) FROM ss_user usr, ss_order so, ss_product sp WHERE usr.available = 1 AND usr.referrer = #{userId} AND so.available = 1 AND usr.user_id = so.user_id and usr.member_level=sp.`level`
